            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20216687">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20216687">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20216687">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20216687">
          <div id="boxatt20216687" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23604158">
              <a id="link_23604158" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23604158,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23631112">
              <a id="link_23631112" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1OIH" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23631112,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23631112}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Environmental Ethics and Philosophy
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examines the philosophical and ethical issues underlying contemporary and historical environmental issues, policies, and debates. Covers concepts, institutions, topics, events and people, including global warming, animal rights, environmental movements, alternative energy, green chemistry, industrial ecology, and eco-sabotage.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23604159">
              <a id="link_23604159" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23604159,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344702}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Newly revised and online, well-respected resource complete with recommended readings for further study.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23631228">
              <a id="link_23631228" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/3VCR" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23631228,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23631228}); ">
               Environmental Encyclopedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides in-depth, worldwide coverage of environmental issues. Each article is written in a nontechnical style and provides current status, analysis, and suggested solutions whenever possible.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20216688">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20216688">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20216688">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative Secondary Commentary in Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20216688">
          <div id="boxatt20216688" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23604160">
              <a id="link_23604160" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23604160,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728731}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23604161">
              <a id="link_23604161" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23604161,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20216689">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20216689">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20216689">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20216689">
          <div id="boxatt20216689" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23604163">
              <a id="link_23604163" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23604163,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23632614">
              <a id="link_23632614" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23632614,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19995931}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our Journal Locator (see above) to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23604162">
              <a id="link_23604162" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23604162,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23632615">
              <a id="link_23632615" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23632615,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive of more than 300 scholarly history journals, all full text. As an archive, there is typically a lag time of 3-5 years from publication until new issues appear in JSTOR. Full text journals include American Historical Review, Journal of American History, Journal of American Studies, Review in American History, Comparative Studies in Society and History, Cultural Critique, Eighteenth Century Studies, Environmental History, Historical Journal, and History and Theory.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23648058">
              <a id="link_23648058" href="http://0-www.sciencedirect.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23648058,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Latin American and Caribbean Environmental Justice', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974078}); ">
               ScienceDirect College Edition Health and Life Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This database includes 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health and life sciences. Coverage spans 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5406535" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20216690">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20216690">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20216690">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20216690">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Or visit the
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           at Purdue.
          </p>
          <p>
           The full text of the Chicago Manual of Style, 16th ed. is available to Muhlenberg College students
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/16/contents.html">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            user guide
           </a>
           to Zotero. NOTE: In order to construct footnotes (as opposed to bibliography), the
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/support/word_processor_plugin_installation_for_zotero_2.1">
            MS Word Plug-In
           </a>
           is needed.
          </p>
          <p>
           Help with annotated bibliographies
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            Visit Purdue's
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
             <em>
              Online Writing Lab
             </em>
            </a>
            for definitions and
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
             format
            </a>
            of an annotation.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt20216690" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
     <div id="footer_topline">

      </span>

      </a>
      or
      <a href="/content_mobile.php?pid=652835&amp;sid=5406535">
       mobile devices
      </a>
      .
     </div>
